entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 10:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
